Question
========

When two events A and B are independent, then

Answerlist
----------

* P(A) = P(A | B).
* P(A and B) = P(A) * P(A | B).
* P(A or B) = P(A) + P(B).

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P(A) = P(A | B)...: Correct
* P(A and B) = P(A) * P(A | B)...: Incorrect
* P(A or B) = P(A) + P(B)...: Incorrect
